snippet.title: Way Of The Hunter | Wild Expeditions Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Explore the vast in-game wilderness and fulfill all your hunting fantasies in the upcoming Wild Expeditions edition of Way of the Hunter. This authentic hunting simulation combines breathtaking landscapes from North America, Europe, New Zealand, and Africa with thrilling storylines and ethical hunting challenges.

Way of the Hunter Wild Expeditions will be available for PlayStation®5 and Xbox Series X|S  on October 29, 2024.

DLCs included:
• Tikamoon Plains
• Aurora Shores
• Matariki Park 
• Lintukoto Reserve
• The Outfits Pack
• Hunter's Pack
